review: I was not sure what to expect for $35, but this thing works really well.  I love the fact that I can control things like NetFlix or Hulu from my smartphone.  That is especially handy when my kids are watching NetFlix and I am in a different room - I can see how much they have left and push more to the TV if desired, as well as stop the show as well.I've also had success with streaming a tab from chrome to my TV via the chromecast extension.  Note it does not work as well at high resolutions, and in full screen mode, as the voice and video are sometimes not synchronized properly.  I am doing this streaming from my laptop (which is hardwired to my router) to the chromecast device (which obviously is wireless).  I have a wireless N router, so it is as fast as you can get.So bottom line, if your only use for this is to stream video from a chrome tab to your TV, it may not meet you needs.  If you want to use it for things like Netflix, Hulu, YouTube, etc, then it is great.
